lines.content: Duke is an interactive chatbot that keeps tracks of tasks.
1. Install Java 11 to your computer if you do not have it.
2. Download v0.2 of Duke to a folder of your choice.
3. On your terminal, access the folder and run `java -jar duke.jar`
Add a task (deadline, event or todo) to the list.
Delete the task from the list.
Display the list of task that are currently recorded.
Find a task based on a keyword.
Mark/Unmark a task in the list as completed.
A more flexible version of Find where only a partial word is required.
Create a todo task and add it to the list.
Returns a notification that the todo is added.
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 1 task in the list.

Returns a notification that the deadline is added.
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 2 tasks in the list.

Returns a notification that the event is added.
Got it. I've added this task:
Now you have 3 tasks in the list.
Display the list of tasks currently kept track of.
Mark a task in the current task list as completed.
Returns a notification that the task has been marked.
Nice! I've marked this task as done:
Unmark a task in the current task list as completed.
Returns a notification that the task has been unmarked.
OK, I've marked this task as not done yet:
Find matching tasks in the current task list with a keyword.
Returns a list of tasks that has matching keyword
Here are the matching tasks in your list:
Search matching tasks in the current task list with a partial word.
Returns a list of tasks that matches the partial word.
Here are the matching tasks in your list:
Delete a task from the list.
Returns a notification of task being deleted.
Now you have 2 tasks in the list
Save the current list to a local file and exit the program automatically after 3 seconds.

* Returns the list of tasks that are being kept track of.
* Adds a new task to the list.
* @param t New task to be added to the list.
assert (isTodo || isDeadline || isEvent) : "Task to be added must be either Todo, Deadline or Event.";
* Deletes a task from the list.
* @param i Index of the task in the list to be deleted.
assert (i >= 1) : "Given index must be at least 1.";
assert (i <= this.taskArrayList.size()) : "Index cannot exceed length of list";
* Marks a task from the list as done.
* @param i Index of the task in the list to be marked.
assert (i >= 1) : "Given index must be at least 1.";
assert (i <= this.taskArrayList.size()) : "Index cannot exceed length of list";
* Unmarks a task from the list as done.
* @param i Index of the task in the list to be unmarked.
assert (i >= 1) : "Given index must be at least 1.";
assert (i <= this.taskArrayList.size()) : "Index cannot exceed length of list";
* Finds tasks in the list that contains the specified input String.
* @param s Input string to be checked against.

* UI interactions from the Duke program.
return "Bye. Hope to see you again soon!";
* Prints a notification that a task has been added to the list
* @param t Task that was added to the list.
* @param len New length of the list.
public String showAdd(Task t, int len) throws DukeException {
assert (isTodo || isDeadline || isEvent) : "Task that was added must be either Todo, Deadline or Event.";
assert (len >= 0) : "Length of list after add must be non-negative.";
String openingMessage = "Got it. I've added this task:\n";
String closingMessage = "Now you have " + len + taskSingularOrPluralWord(len) + "in the list.";
* Prints a notification that a task has been deleted from the list
* @param t Task that was deleted from the list.
* @param len New length of the list.
public String showDelete(Task t, int len) throws DukeException {
assert (isTodo || isDeadline || isEvent) : "Task that was deleted must be either Todo, Deadline or Event.";
assert (len >= 0) : "Length of list after delete must be non-negative.";
String openingMessage = "Noted. I've removed this task:\n";
String tasksLeft = "Now you have " + len + taskSingularOrPluralWord(len) + "in the list.";
* Prints a notification that a task has been marked as done.
* @param t Task that was marked as done.
assert (isTodo || isDeadline || isEvent) : "Task that was marked must be either Todo, Deadline or Event.";
return "Nice! I've marked this task as done:\n" + t;
* Prints a notification that a task has been unmarked as done.
* @param t Task that was unmarked as done.
assert (isTodo || isDeadline || isEvent) : "Task that was unmarked must be either Todo, Deadline or Event.";
return "OK, I've marked this task as not done yet:\n" + t;
* Prints a notification of tasks being found.
return "Here are the matching tasks in your list:\n";
private String taskSingularOrPluralWord(int len) throws DukeException {
String errorMessage = "Length of task list must not be non-negative.";
assert (len >= 0) : "Length of task list must be non-negative.";

* Executable command that modifies the list of tasks and/or storage.
